long_description: bespoke music for film, tv, and advertisement. a unique and diverse network of music professionals, committed to providing captivating original compositions to perfectly support our client's vision, elevating the sensory experience for media audiences worldwide. a film created to celebrate the re-branding of one of the most successful beauty companies in the world. but in rio de janeiro, above all else, you must watch how the bodies move.' a collection of films for equinox and furthermore featuring street athletes in rio de janeiro. galleries lafayette: le nouveau chic re-launch campaign 2015. the construction story of the award winning new distillery built to house the peerless spirit that is the macallan. at bloom, we specialize in bespoke music creation, sync, post, mixing, and recording services. our passion for music and sound helps us to bring our clients' visions to life. original music that meets the brief. we will amplify your vision, ensuring the music, sonic branding, or sound design elevate your project while exciting and engaging your audience.

generated_description: bloom music is a london-based company specializing in bespoke music creation, sync, post-production, mixing, and recording services. the company is a collective of musicians, composers, and producers dedicated to uniting motion picture and music in a unique and captivating way. bloom music creates music to amplify emotion and elevate projects, focusing on tv, film, media, and advertising. their services include music composition, sonic branding, audio post-production, and recording and mixing. bloom music has worked with notable clients such as flora, coty, and rankin, delivering high-quality music tailored to their clients' visions.
